segments.text: I can promise you that , if you buy our product , you will be getting quality .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve looked at your units , and I am very happy with them . Your goods are all far above standard quality .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We spend a lot of money to make sure that our quality is much better . We don ’ t sacrifice quality for quick profits .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we ’ re really interested in placing an order under negotiation . We can start the negotiations as soon as you want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s great . I ’ m glad we ’ ll be able to do business together . I ’ ll have some quotes ready for you by tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine . Also , would you mind if I asked to see a surveyor ’ s report of your products ? I may have a few more questions about your quality analysis .
segments.speaker: S2
